title: Flexbox
content:
# Containers

* If the items inside a container don't fit when the screen is shrunk they will shrink, if there's enough space they will render in the prefefined size.


### Display Types

* Display : Flex
    - Elements are positioned next to each other
    - Container will display on a block level


* Display : Inline-Flex
    - Elements are positioned next to each other
    - Container will change to Inline Level
    - does not make flex items display inline. It makes the flex container display inline next to each other
    - Items will shrink if the box is too small for all of them to fit


### Wrapping 

* Flex-wrap: Wrap
   - Makes items in container appear in new line
* Flex-wrap: Wrap-Reverse
   - Makes items in container appear in new line but reversed



<!-- ![](image-kxgznnaf.png) -->

### Moving Elements 

* Justify Content
   - Controls alignment of all items on the main(horizontal) axis.
* Align Items
   - Controls alignment of all items on the cross(vertical) axis.
   - For aligning elements within a single row
* Align Content
   - For aligning elements within multiples rows
   - Controls alignment of all items on the cross(vertical) axis.
   - Brings elements together


### Positioning
* Flex-Direction: Row 
   - Elements will be positioned from left to right across the parent element starting from the top left corner (default).
* Flex-Direction: Row Reverse
   - Elements will be positioned from right to left across the parent element starting from the top right corner.
* Flex-Direction: Column
   -  Elements will be positioned from top to bottom of the parent element starting from the top left corner.
   - Align Items moves this element horizontaly and not vertically
* Flex-Direction: Column Reverse
  - Elements will be positioned from the bottom to the top of the parent element starting from the bottom left corner.
  - Align Items moves this element horizontaly and not vertically



# Items 

### Items Sizing

* Flex : Grow
    - Items grow as N times when expanded

* Flex : Srink
    - Items shrink as N times when collapsed

* Flex : Basis
   - Sets a minimum size for an item

## Flex Short Hand

  `flex`: `flex-grow`, `lex-shrink`,`flex-basis`
  
  `flex-flow`: `column`, `wrap`
